title: Nos Da Mabon
content: Huw sy'n adrodd hanes Mabon a'i dad yn paratoi i ddarllen stori cyn cysgu. A story for infants about Mabon and his dad getting ready to read a story before going to sleep.
contentSnippet: Huw sy'n adrodd hanes Mabon a'i dad yn paratoi i ddarllen stori cyn cysgu. A story for infants about Mabon and his dad getting ready to read a story before going to sleep.
